Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Momo shopping is under Fubon Media Technology which is the leading online retailer in Taiwan. Our business includs Motian Mall, TV shopping and catalog shopping. Headquartered in Taiwan, our group is also actively establishing international markets. On the mainland, Fubon Gehua (Beijing) Trade Co., Ltd. was established in May 2011. In March 2014, our company established TVD momo in Thailand as a joint venture.
